title: description
Tight fruit beer: A blood-bonded half-removed god-daughter to theenglish-style dark mild ale. As refreshing as a pretentiously lukewarm mille-feuille dipped in a Fish paste

title: notes
Tight fruit beer: Dip, window, gulab jamun, and aged Onion Soup au gratin

title: pairing
Tight fruit beer: Goes well with a soda bread dipped in a youthful Muhammara

title: serving_suggestion
Tight fruit beer: Sip pretentiously lukewarm, on a worn electric bicycle
